DOC.brief_summary: We wanted to examine the immunogenicity and safety of a shortened specific immunotherapy in contrast to the standard specific immunotherapy. Therefore, we challenged 12 patients for 14 weeks with the standard specific scheme and 22 patients for 6 weeks with the shortened scheme.
DOC.brief_title: Compatibility and Immunogenicity of a Short Specific Immunotherapy (SIT) in Contrast to Classic Specific Immunotherapy
